description:
reddish and brown striped wood throughout; black rod; silver inlay on barrel wood, forearm and stock; tooled elk on trigger guard, fighting elk on patch box; "Keith Casteel" engraved in top of barrel. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: Curly maple, iron, steel, brass, silver, gold
title: "Hercules," American-style (1750-1770) Flintlock Longrifle
